Posts.Content: Oct 21, 2008 04:10PM auntgina wrote: I don't know how I am going to cope. I am a 59 year old woman who lost her Mom on Feb 15, 2008. My siblings and I have gotten through the rest of this year, by having Mothers' Day dinner  and the rest of the holidays at her home with our family. No one lives there. But last  Christmas is when we really saw her going down hill. I don't know what we're going to do this holiday season. Is it macabre to have the holidays at her home? We're not ready to let go yet. Thanks
